tables.name: trains
tables.table-description: Table containing information about trains owned by the train company

columns.name: train_id
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to each train

columns.name: model
columns.description: Model or type of the train

columns.name: seats
columns.description: Total number of seats in the train

columns.name: manufacturing_date
columns.description: Date when the train was manufactured

tables.name: routes
tables.table-description: Table containing information about train routes

columns.name: route_id
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to each route

columns.name: origin
columns.description: Starting point of the train route

columns.name: destination
columns.description: Final destination of the train route

columns.name: distance
columns.description: Distance covered by the train route in kilometers

tables.name: daily_schedule
tables.table-description: Table linking trains to their daily schedules on specific routes

columns.name: schedule_id
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to each daily schedule entry

columns.name: train_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the train scheduled for the day

columns.name: route_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the route assigned to the train on the day

columns.name: departure_time
columns.description: Time when the train departs on the scheduled route

columns.name: arrival_time
columns.description: Time when the train arrives at the final destination on the scheduled route
